title: BINUS Digital Museum
description: An information kiosk about memorabilia items, peoples, and stories in BINUS University. It is best viewed at a resolution of 1920x1080 pixels as it will be displayed on a large 55-inch Android TV screen at BINUS Alam Sutera, but it also support mobile screen.

title: 3Digibees
description: A website for 3D assets repository similar to Sketchfab, where Binusian users can upload their 3D models, add annotations, share them using an iframe code similar to YouTube, and view them in AR. The live demo need you to login, but you can try the annotation feature here.

title: 3D Annotation
description: Annotation system for 3D objects using Modelviewer library and ReactJS.

title: BINUS Bootstrap
description: A CSS framework similar to Twitter Bootstrap is used for building apps at BINUS University.
